Trivia She did the voice for Elmira's older sister in several episodes of the cartoon Tiny Toon Adventures. Family Life She married Jason Goldberg in 1998, and they had two daughters and two sons together.

item.title: Why Is Flash Going Away? Adobe Announces End-of-Life Plans for Flash
item.description: Adobe Flash Is Dying This Year, but You Can Still Play Your Favorite Flash GamesBy Abi TravisUpdated June 15 2020, 4:45 p.m. ET Source: Getty Images/TwitterRemember Dec. 31, 1999? Everyone was very worried that all of our computers switching to the year 2000 would wreak havoc on basically everything. It was a very big deal 20 years ago (and, to be fair, the Y2K bug did wreak havoc on some things).

item.title: Danileigh's Sister Is Breaking Her Silence About How DaBaby Treated DaniLeigh
item.description: DaniLeigh's mother and sister are speaking out about her relationship with DaBaby as the drama between the two of them continues to unfold. Source: Getty ImagesThe drama between DaniLeigh and DaBaby has continued to unfold in recent days, and now, her family has gotten involved in the ordeal. The fighting started on Nov. 15 after DaniLeigh claimed that she wanted to take a Plan B pill, and DaBaby became upset and kicked her out of their house.

item.title: Dia Nash - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Daughter of actress Niecy Nash who caught the performing bug herself after appearing on her mother's show Claws in 2018. She also became a popular figure on Instagram with over 110,000 followers. Before Fame She graduated from high school with honors in June 2017. Trivia She was featured on the reality special Niecy Nash's Wedding Bash in 2011. Family Life Her mother Niecy was nominated for back-to-back Emmys for Getting On from 2015-2016. Her father Don is an ordained minister.

item.title: Extreme Hotels That Are Insanely Unique and Luxurious
item.description: These 'Extreme' Hotels Are Insanely Unique And Insanely LuxuriousBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated April 26 2020, 4:27 p.m. ET Source: conrad maldives rangali islandThe words "extreme" and "vacation" rarely go hand in hand, because the entire point of a vacation is to go out and enjoy yourself by relaxing. So unless you're extremely relaxing yourself, then you can count me out. But there are some resorts and hotels that go so far with a certain concept that there's no other word to describe it.

item.title: Lynn Collins - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress most recognized for her role as Hugh Jackman's love interest in X-Men Origins: Wolverine. Her other credits include 50 First Dates, Numb, Unconditional and Rim of the World. Before Fame She attended and graduated from Juilliard School's Drama Division. Trivia She made her television debut in 1999 in an episode of Law & Order: Special Victims Unit. Family Life She married actor Steven Strait in 2007 but the couple divorced in 2013.

item.title: We Demand The Immediate Removal Of Keyamo, Cardoso
item.description: The Joint Action Committee of Northern Youth Associations has demanded the removal of the Minister of Aviation, Festus Keyamo and the governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Yemi Cardoso. The group made the demand via a communique issued on Thursday and signed by its convener, Murtala Abubakar, Director of public Communication and Strategy, Hashim Tom Maiyashi, and Director, Gender Mobilization, Latifa Abdussalam. The group praised the Northern caucus of the Senate but urged the lawmakers to seek the sack of the two appointees of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu

item.title: Chelsea DeBoer - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: MTV veteran who starred on the reality shows Teen Mom 2 and 16 and Pregnant. Before Fame She first gained fame on 16 and Pregnant. After the birth of her daughter, she obtained her GED.  Trivia She has an enormous social media following on both Twitter and Instagram, with more than 6 million followers on the latter platform. Family Life She has a daughter named Aubree from a relationship with her ex-boyfriend Adam Lind.

item.title: Danielle MacDonald Stars in Netflix's 'Unbelievable' Details
item.description: Danielle MacDonald Stars in 'Unbelievable,' a Miniseries That Aims to Shed Light on Victim-BlamingBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Sept. 13 2019, 5:46 p.m. ET Source: netflixAustralian actress Danielle MacDonald blew up for her roles in Patti Cake$ and her turn as Willowdean Dickson in Dumplin,' and you might remember her for the impactful performance in the scary/ridiculous and super popular horror flick Bird Box opposite Sandra Bullock. Fans of the 28-year-old performer were excited to discover that both she and Toni Collette would be in the series that covers the tragic assault of teen Marie Adler.

item.title: Is Todd Hoffman Returning to Gold Rush?'
item.description: ‘Gold Rush’ Star Todd Hoffman Is Getting His Own Spin-off Show on DiscoveryBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Feb. 7 2022, 2:35 p.m. ET Source: Instagram | @goldrushtoddFor whatever reason, people have been wigging out over the prospect of finding a shiny yellow-brownish metal of malleable material under the earth for thousands of years. Why else would Gold Rush consistently become cable's top-rated program and a huge advertising cashcow for Discovery. And fans of the series want to know if popular-series personality Todd Hoffman is ever returning to it.

item.title: Liverpool Win Carabao Cup After Beating Chelsea On Penalties
item.description: Liverpool has won this season’s Carabao Cup competition. The Reds were all out in the 2021-2022 Carabao cup final today against Premier League rivals, Chelsea at Wembley. Chelsea and Liverpool have drawn their last two meetings, most recently an entertaining 2-2 draw on January 2. The regular football time had ended with a goalless draw as both sides could not find a breakthrough. Naija News reports that the extra time awarded was also not enough for either Chelsea or Liverpool to win hence the need for penalty kicks.

item.title: Victor Osimhen Aims To Use 2023 AFCON To Please Super Eagles Fans
item.description: Napoli striker, Victor Osimhen, has said his aim with the Super Eagles of Nigeria is to win his first Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Ivory Coast to compensate for missing out on the 2022 FIFA World Cup. Victor Osimhen, who is the reigning African Player of the Year, believes that winning the 2023 AFCON will be a good way to compensate Super Eagles’ fans for all the disappointment the team has subjected them to over the years.

item.title: Buhari To Fulfil N5,000 Promise, Others
item.description: The Federal Government on  has proposed N500 billion in the 2016 budget as social investment. This was contained in the Medium Term Expenditure Framework (MTEF), sent from President Muhammadu Buhari dated to the National Assembly. In the letter, the programmes include social feeding programmes initiatives, conditional cash transfer to the most vulnerable and post National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) grant. This will be performed in collaboration with the state government to institute well-structured social welfare programmes.

item.title: Lagos Govt Returns To Supreme Court Over Magodo Estate Tussle
item.description: The Lagos State Government has approached the Supreme Court to get clarification on the initial ruling on the occupation of Magodo Estate. On February 10, 2012, the apex court had in a ruling ordered the Lagos government to compensate some landlords with 549 plots of land after their properties were demolished at Shangisha. After years of disobeying the judgement, Shangisha landlords approached the Federal government for the enforcement of the apex court decision.

item.title: Southern, Middle-belt Nigerians Task Buhari On Unknown Gunmen In South-east
item.description: The Southern and Middle-Belt Alliance (SaMBA) has called on President Muhammadu Buhari and all South-east governors to urgently expose and apprehend the sponsors of the “unknown gunmen” in the region. The group in its statement issued on Monday and signed by its Spokesman, Prince Rwang Pam Jnr. asked President Buhari to take immediate steps to tackle the growing menace of violence in Anambra and the entire South-east region. Naija News had reported that some unknown gunmen on Friday morning killed a bus driver and set the bus ablaze while enforcing the sit-at-home order of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) in Imo state.

item.title: What Buhari Did To Me In 7 Years Of Leadership Osinbajo
item.description: Nigeria’s number two citizen, Prof. Yemi Osinbajo has revealed how President Muhammadu Buhari has treated him in their seven years in office. According to Osinbajo, none of his predecessors ever enjoyed the kind of opportunities his principal had presented to him in office as the Vice President. The All Progressives Congress, APC presidential aspirant said this while reiterating his vast experiences worthy of note to become Nigeria’s next president, Naija News reports.

item.title: Who Are the 'Deadliest Catch' Captains? A Recap of the Active Vessels
item.description: An Overview Look at the Ships and Captains on the 'Deadliest Catch'Just like the waters, the rotating cast of captains is quite turbulent, so don't feel bad if you're getting confused. By Alex WestPublished July 27 2024, 1:50 p.m. ET Source: DiscoveryThe Deadliest Catch lore runs deep and keeping track of all the crew members isn't always easy. With 19 seasons of the show, they've racked up quite a few vessels run by plenty of different personalities.

item.title: Cameron and Clare Have Some Key Differences To Sort Out on 'Married at First Sight' (EXCLUSIVE CLIP)
item.description: Home > Television > Reality TV > Married At First SightClare and Cameron have a serious talk about privilege and setting goals in an exclusive 'Married at First Sight' clip ahead of a new episode. The Gist: Clare worries that Cameron may not have motivation in his career on Married at First Sight.Cameron has a different mindset about his career than Clare.Clare and Cameron may not be totally attracted to each other on MAFS.

item.description: How to make my straight hair curly? How to curl short natural hair? How to straighten hair? These are the topical issues for every woman. The thing is, all women need diversity. There is hardly any girl who doesn’t want the changes in her life. If you have short hair, find out some ways to curl it stylishly and without harm. This post will help you to make curls at home without services of professionals.

item.title: 'This Is The Most Sensible Appointment'
item.description: Nollywood actor cum producer, Kunle Afolayan, has commended President Bola Tinubu for appointing eleven new Chief Executive Officers for agencies under the Ministry of Art, Culture, and Creative Economy. Naija News reported that the Presidential spokesman, Ajuri Ngelale, made this known in a statement issued on Friday in Abuja. Among those appointed into offices are entertainment guru Obi Asika, who will head the National Council for Arts and Culture, and veteran Kannywood actor and Director, Ali Nuhu, who will head the Nigerian Film Corporation.

item.title: Black Panther - Cast, Ages, Trivia
item.description: Marvel film about a prince who returns home to his African nation of Wakanda to become king. Ryan Coogler wrote and directed the film. The film went on to gross over $1 billion at the box office worldwide while also becoming the most tweeted about movie ever.  Trivia The fighting in the film is based on African martial arts. Black Panther was filmed in Argentina, South Korea, and Atlanta, Georgia, USA. It became the first Marvel film to receive a nomination for Best Picture.

item.title: Chinko Ekun Biography - Legit.ng
item.description: After his impressive freestyle performance at Olamide Live in Concert, Chinko Ekun became a person of interest in the music industry. Here are some interesting details about this promising Nigerian musician. Chinko Ekun is a fast rising Nigerian rapper. His full name is Oladipo Olamide Emmanuel. Nickname "Chinko Ekun" is just an alias which he adopted as his stage name. He was once asked about how he came across the combination “Chinko Ekun”.

item.title: Dawood Savage - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Comedy content creator and social media personality who rose to fame by sharing a variety of skits on his dawoodsavager Instagram account. He has earned more than 180,000 followers on the platform. He has also grown his DawoodSAVAGE YouTube channel to over 1.1 million followers. Before Fame In 2019 he made a meme parodying rappers such as 6IX9INE. Trivia He created a viral series of skits titled "Muslim Rap Battle." One of his most popular videos revolves around Muslims in the horror genre.

item.title: Wilson Sossion aishambulia serikali ya Uhuru baada ya korti kutupilia mbali agizo la kumtaka ajiuzul
item.description: -Waziri wa Leba,Phylis Kandie alikuwa amemuamuru katibu mkuu wa KNUT, Wilson Sossion kujiuzulu baada ya kuteuliwa katika bunge na chama cha ODM -Kandie alikuwa ametaka viongozi wote wa vyama vya wafanya kazi ambao walikuwa wameteuliwa bungeni kujiuzulu haraka iwezekanavyo - Sossion sasa ameshambulia rais Uhuru Kenyatta na naibu wake William Ruto kwa kutaka kumuondoa uongozini ili waajiri viongozi ambao hawataibabaisha serikali Katibu mkuu wa chama cha walimu KNUT, Wilson Sossion amevunja kimya chake baada ya yeye na viongozi wengine kuamurishwa kujiuzulu ili washughulike na masuala ya kisiasa badala yake

item.title: Gene Tierney - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Best Actress Oscar nominee who appeared in the 1945 film Leave Her to Heaven. She later appeared in Laura, The Ghost and Mrs. Muir, and Leave Her to Heaven. Before Fame She was offered an acting contract at age 17 while visiting Warner Bros. Studios. Trivia Her beauty and acting skill landed her the title role in the 1944 Oscar-nominated film Laura. Family Life She was married to her second husband, W.

item.title: Harnaaz Sandhu's Parents Had the Cutest Reaction to Her Winning Miss Universe 2021
item.description: The Mother of Miss Universe 2021 Winner Harnaaz Sandhu Didn’t Watch Her Daughter Win, but for Good ReasonBy Kelly CorbettPublished Dec. 13 2021, 12:22 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesOn Dec. 12, Miss India Harnaaz Sandhu was officially crowned Miss Universe 2021. The 21-year-old actress, who is currently studying for a master’s degree in public administration, beat out 79 other contestants from all over the world to win this prestigious honor. Placing beside her was runner-up Miss Paraguay Nadia Ferreira and second runner-up Miss South Africa Lalela Mswane.

item.title: How Much Money Did Bloomberg Spend? Let's Put It Into Perspective
item.description: How Much Money Did Bloomberg Spend? He Dropped a Staggering Amount in Just 101 DaysBy Michelle SteinUpdated March 4 2020, 5:00 p.m. ET Source: Joe Raedle/GettyIn case you missed out on the excitement, Super Tuesday — the most signifiant day of voting in the 2020 primary election — went down on March 3. Democratic presidential candidates were vying for delegates in 14 states and in one U.S. territory, and Michael Bloomberg, among others, did not fare well.

item.title: Justice Uwais's Son Allegedly Joins ISIS In Middle East
item.description: The Nigerian Watch has reported that the son of Former chief justice of Nigeria Muhammadu Uwais has gone to the Middle East to join the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (Isis) terrorist group. The son of the 79-year-old Justice Uwais, who served as the chief justice of the Supreme Court of Nigeria from 1995 till 2006, is now an active combatant with Isis. READ ALSO: Elections 2015: Top Points From The Uwais Report

item.title: Why Can't Some People Access the Anime AI Filter on TikTok?
item.description: Many users have started posting TikToks using the anime AI filter. Sadly, not everyone has access to the filter — here's why users are having issues. You can take your TikTok videos to a whole new level with filters. There are some really groovy filters on the app. For example, there's the out-of-body filter, which literally makes users look like they're having an out-of-body experience. Or the Belle filter, which doesn't turn you into a Disney princess, but does change up your look.

item.title: APC Chairman, Adamu Tackles El-Rufai, Amaechi Over Public Outbursts Against Govt
item.description: The National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Senator Abdullahi Adamu has issued a strong warning to Kaduna State Governor Nasir El-Rufai and the Minister of Transportation, Rotimi Amaechi over their recent outbursts following the Abuja-Kaduna train attack. Naija News recalls El-Rufai and Amaechi in different statements after the attack seems to have engaged in blame trading on who is responsible for the security lapses that led to the attack on the Abuja-Kaduna train by bandit terrorists in which many lives were lost, some injured and others kidnapped.

item.title: Celia Lovsky - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Notable for her performances in American films such as Foxfire (1955) and Man of a Thousand Faces (1957), this Austrian-born actress is also remembered for her guest spots or recurring roles on Dragnet, Playhouse 90, Marcus Welby, M.D., and numerous other television series. Before Fame She began her acting career in the theatre, appearing in Berlin and Vienna productions of Karl Kraus' Dream Theater and Shakespeare's Othello. Trivia She studied drama, foreign languages, and dance at the Austrian Royal Academy of Arts and Music.

item.title: Kenyan Moms Share Fun Tricks They Use to Encourage Their Children to Save
item.description: To encourage saving culture, some moms reward various good behaviours, but the money goes into the piggy bankSome moms make sure their kids have a list before going to the supermarket to avoid extra demandsOther moms remind their kids to save up for their birthdaysPAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.co.ke’s Patreon programme It is often said, do not save what is left after spending; instead, spend what is left after saving.

item.title: New Naira Notes: Emefiele Told Me Rumored Removal Of Arabic Inscriptions Is Baseless
item.description: A former Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) Governor, Sanusi Lamido Sanusi has disclosed that the CBN Governor Godwin Emefiele has assured him that the rumoured removal of the Arabic inscription on the Naira notes was baseless. According to Sanusi, the proposed redesigned naira notes, which is set to be implemented between December and January next year, will all carry Arabic inscriptions. Naija News learnt that the former apex bank governor in a short video shared on his social media platforms was reported to have debunked rumour of the removal of the Arabic inscriptions on the new naira note, saying Emefiele had assured him that the rumoured removal of the Arabic inscriptions on the new naira were baseless.

item.title: 'I Had Three Miscarriages' - Mabel Makun Shares Powerful Testimony
item.description: The wife of Nigerian comedian, Ayo Makun, better known as Comedian AY, Mabel Makun has shared her baby’s testimony whilst recounting her experience through the journey. Naija News recalls that the popular comedian and his beautiful wife welcomed their second child thirteen years after they had their first child, Michelle Makun. Sharing her baby bump; Mabel revealed how she had had three miscarriages before the birth of Ayomide. She further revealed that she felt she was unable to protect her unborn children that she lost.

item.title: Amelia Wray - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress, singer and dancer who earned a fan base after landing a recurring role on Sydney to the Max in 2019. Also a stage performer, she has appeared in productions of Fun Home and Secret Garden. Before Fame She was featured in the 2016 short One Starry Starry Night. Trivia She once shot a television pilot that co-starred a Capuchin monkey named Crystal. Family Life Her parents' names are Chauncie and Cory. She has a twin brother named Mitchell who is also an actor.

Source: InstagramThe Hype Houseis breaking up, and the fall of the first TikTok collab house has revealed a lot of behind-the-scenes drama. Daisy Keech initiated the group's breakup after feeling her contributions to the collective were unrecognized, and since then the once-awed group has begun to slowly disband.

Andor, the television series set before the events of Rogue One and starring Diego Luna as Rebellion spy Cassian Andor, has already re-introduced several beloved Star Wars characters.

item.description: - Polisi wameanzisha msako wa majambazi waliovamia hospitali ya John Lee mtaani Shauri Moyo na kuiba mashine ya kusafisha damu siku ya Jumatatu, Machi 5 usiku - Majambazi hao waliiba pesa, simu za rukono na mashine hiyo ya kusafisha damu - Polisi wamefichua kuwa wamekwisha pata habari muhimu zitakazowasaidia kuwaandama majambazi hao Polisi wameanzisha uchunguzi kuwanasa majambazi wanne waliovamia hospitali ya John Lee eneo la Jericho karibu na mtaa wa Shauri Moyo na kutoroka na pesa, simu za rukono na mashine ya kusafisha damu.

item.title: What Happened to Shauna's Baby in Yellowjackets? Details Here
item.description: We Finally Know What Happened to Shauna's Baby in 'Yellowjackets' (SPOILERS)By Anna GarrisonMay 5 2023, Published 2:05 a.m. ET Source: ShowtimeSpoiler alert! This article contains major spoilers for Season 2, Episode 6 of Yellowjackets. When Teen Shauna (Sophie Nélisse) revealed her pregnancy during Season 1 of Yellowjackets, fans theorized about what would happen to her baby. After all, navigating teen pregnancy while stranded in the woods with a group of hungry soccer teammates after losing your best friend to hypothermia isn't everyone's ideal way of starting a family.

item.title: Buhari Govt Declares Ex-Naval Officer Wanted Over Channels TV Interview
item.description: The Muhammadu Buhari-led federal government has reportedly declared a former Navy Commodore, Kunle Olawunmi, wanted over his controversial interview on Channels Television. Naija News reports that the controversial interview on Channels Television’s ‘Sunrise Daily’ breakfast programme was held last Wednesday. Sources in Nigeria’s intelligence circle have revealed that operatives of the Department of State Services and the Defence Intelligence Agency have since launched a manhunt for Olawunmi, PUNCH reports. When contacted, DIA spokesperson, Major Afolashade Ojolowo, said he has been on leave and could not confirm the development.

item.title: Chris Kirkpatrick - Age, Family, Bio
Is Maia Mitchell Leaving 'Good Trouble'? Here's What We Know
item.description: Is Maia Mitchell leaving 'Good Trouble'? The actress, who portrays ambitious law clerk Callie, has given clues that she might leave the show. Source: Getty ImagesActress Maia Mitchell first made her debut in Callie's role on June 3, 2013, in the Season 1 opener of The Fosters. She continued playing Callie in Good Trouble, a spinoff of The Fosters, after Season 5 of the show wrapped up on June 6, 2018.

item.title: Nigeria Records 180.29% Increase On Crude Oil, Gas Sales In May
item.description: The Nigerian oil sector recorded a booming increase in sales of petroleum products to the tune of $219.75m in May 2021. The figures means 180.29% increase on sales of crude oil, gasoline product was recorded from the previous month of April 2021. The development is contained in a communique released on Monday by the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation, NNPC. Naija News understands the communique contained the corporation’s Monthly Financial and Operations Report (MFOR) for the month of May 2021.

item.title: Ohanaeze Reacts, Sends Strong Warning To APC After Report Of Lawan's Emergence As Consensus Candidat
item.description: The Ohanaeze Ndigbo Worldwide has rejected the idea of the emergence of Senate President Ahmad Lawan as the consensus presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC). It said such a move is immature and a political miscalculation by the ruling party. The Ohanaeze stated that if the APC picks Lawan as its 2023 candidate, the ruling party can say goodbye to winning the presidential election. The statement signed by the Secretary-General of Ohanaeze, Mazi Okechukwu Isiguzoro said Lawan lacks the national acceptability needed of a presidential candidate and the APC may just be shooting itself in the leg by such action.

item.title: 'Life Begins At 40' A Sad Reality For Hushpuppi As He Marks 40th Birthday In Prison
item.description: The popular cliché that life begins at ’40’ is no doubt a sad reality for Nigerian Instagram celebrity cum International fraudster, Ramon Abbas also known as Hushpuppi, as he celebrates his 40th birthday in prison. Naija News reports that Hushpuppi before his arrest in June 2020, boasts of over 2.5 million followers on Instagram and had taken great pride in himself as the highest-paid social media influencer. The 40-year-old fraudster, who was born on October 11, 1982, claimed to be a real estate developer and was also known for his lavish lifestyle, spending on exotic cars, designer clothes, and bags from luxury brands, especially Gucci.

item.title: Caden Davis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Short form comedy, lip sync, and prank content creator on TikTok. His popularity on the platform led to him amassing more than 240,000 followers. He posts to TikTok under the name itscadendavis. Before Fame He played football for William Mason High School. Trivia He visited the Routan Islands during spring break 2019. He has seen the videos on his TikTok channel achieve over 12 million total likes. He was recognizable for his long hair, until cutting most of it off during the spring of 2022; he shared the alteration with his TikTok fans through a montage of photos.

item.title: Does Micah From 'Love Is Blind' Live in Arizona?
item.description: Does Micah from 'Love Is Blind' live in Arizona? Here's everything you need to know about where Micah lives now, her job, and more! Among the most controversial candidates in the history of the Netflix original reality dating series, Love Is Blind, is Micah Lussier. Early on, Micah shook things up in the ladies' lounge when she made connections with not one, but two men in the pods. In the end, she curved Kwame Appiah for her now-fiancé Paul Peden.

item.title: Jonathan's Administration Behind Fuel Scarcity - Minister
item.description: Lai Mohammed, the minister of information, on Monday, December 21, blamed former president Goodluck Jonathan’s administration for the present fuel queues being experienced across the country. The minister said this when he spoke to reporters shortly after the end of Federal Executive Council  meeting at the State House, Abuja. He said that Jonathan’s government failed to make provision for fuel subsidy as far back as August 2014, The Nation reports.

item.title: Karen Nyamu Blasts Fans Judging Her for Singing Baby Daddy Samidoh's Songs
item.description: Karen said she has every right to enjoy and sing along to Samidoh's songs just like anyone elseShe insisted that she is in good terms with the musician because he is not a deadbeat fatherThis came hours after she shared a video of herself dancing and singing along to Samidoh's jam on her IGPAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.co.ke’s Patreon programme Nairobi politician Karen Nyamu has never been a person other people could walk over the way they want.

item.title: 20,000 APC, NNPP Members Defect To PDP In President Buhari's Zone (Photos)
item.description: About twenty thousand members of the All Progressives Congress (APC) and the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) on Sunday defected to the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). The development boosted the chances of the PDP reclaiming the state in the 2023 general election. Naija News learnt that the event took place in Baure, under the Katsina North Senatorial zone. The zone is popularly called Daura senatorial zone where President Muhammadu Buhari comes from.

item.title: Emefiele Granted N20 Million Bail After Six Weeks In DSS Custody
item.description: The suspended Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Godwin Emefiele has been granted bail in the sum of N20 million and a surety in like sum. Justice Nicholas Oweibo of the Federal High Court in Ikoyi, Lagos, granted the bail in a ruling on Tuesday. The judge rejected the Federal Government’s bail application and the claim that Emefiele was a flight risk, saying that the plaintiff failed to provide any facts to support its claim.

item.title: Labour Party Faction Backs Peter Obi, Abure, Doyin Okupe

In a statement by Jagun Lookman, Deputy State Chairman (Ogun East); Chief Ope Ijaola, Deputy State Chairman; Prince Oluwatosin Meadows, State Organising Secretar; to Naija News on Friday, a faction in Ogun State slammed the State chapter Chairman, Michael Ashade.

item.title: ICPC Speaks On DSS Carting Away Files Implicating President Tinubu
item.description: The Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission (ICPC) has debunked a report claiming the Department of State Services (DSS) raided its office to cart away some files implicating President Bola Tinubu and some of his close aides. This follows earlier claims by an online news platform that the DSS allegedly carted away sensitive files from the Code of Conduct Bureau (CCB) and the Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission ( ICPC).

item.title: Is Instagram's Archive Feature Gone? Some Users Have Noticed a Change
item.description: Instagram's Archive Button Has Moved, and Some Users Think That It's VanishedBy Joseph AllenPublished Feb. 9 2022, 11:55 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIdeally, any changes to the user experience inside a popular app like Instagram will be done for the benefit of the users on the platform. Sometimes, though, a change is made that leaves people frustrated instead of thrilled. Recently, some users have noticed that Instagram's archive button, which allows you to save posts and stories in a dedicated collection, seems to have disappeared.

item.title: Jack Wagner's Younger Son, Harrison Wagner, Was Found Dead
item.description: What was Harrison Wagner's cause of death? Harrison Wagner was found dead on Monday, June 6, 2022, in a parking lot in North Hollywood, Los Angeles. Source: Instagram / @harrisonwagnerSeveral months ago, Harrison Wagner — son of actor Jack Wagner — passed away. The General Hospital and Melrose Place alum lost his younger son on Monday, June 6, 2022. He is survived by Jack, his mother Kristina, and his brother Peter as well as his adoptive daughter Kerry.

item.title: June 13 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Your varied interests make finding a career path difficult, but not impossible. Use your gifts of charm and influence in a leadership role, such as management, business or public relations. You may be well suited to entertain others, which was the case with Tim Allen, also born on June 13th. Fashion may also be your calling, which was included in the pursuits of Mary Kate and Ashley Olsen, two more of your birthday twins.

item.title: Robbers Kill Two Police Officers, Steal N24m From Bank
item.description: Four people including two police officers were on Wednesday, July 23 killed by armed robbers as they attacked a bank in the Alaba International Market in Ojo, Lagos. PUNCH Metro learnt that the incident started at about 2.30pm at the Alaba cash center of Fidelity Bank. Witnesses said four people died, while others were injured in the incident. It was also gathered that the robbers carted away about N24m A source said: “Some persons were injured and had been taken to the hospital, four persons died, including two policemen,” she said.

item.title: Ekiti 2022: Why I Dumped PDP For SDP
item.description: The candidate for the Social Democratic Party (SDP) in the June 18 2022 governorship election in Ekiti State, Segun Oni has opened up on the reason he dumped the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Speaking on Sunday during a debate organized for governorship candidates, Oni disclosed that he dumped the PDP because he dislikes cheating. He added that he can’t pitch his tent with cheaters, hence the reason for his defection.

item.title: Narok: Mademu waanikana baada ya kushiriki mahaba
item.description: Wanadada wawili kutoka Narok mjini waliwaacha watu vinywa wazi walipoanza kugombana na kuanika siri zao mmoja wao alipomlaumu mwenzake kwa kumsaliti. Udaku mtaani ulisema kwamba, vipusa hao wana wapenzi lakini waliamua kwenda hepi na kisha kushiriki mahaba na majamaa wengine ambao walikuwa wanawamezea mate. Habari Nyingine: Mkongwe wa muziki wa soukous star Aurlus Mabele aaga dunia Kwa mujibu wa Taifa Leo, wanadada hao ambao ni marafiki wa dhati walikuwa njiani kuelekea ushago kwa mmoja wao ambapo waliamua kushuka na kushiriki ufuska na majamaa wengine.

item.title: Association of Insurers Clarifies Cars Involved in Accidents During Curfew Hours Will Be Compensated
item.description: - The association explained compensations cannot be withdrawn on the basis of the time of the accident - It clarified that a claim can be denied in case of other circumstances that are excluded from the motor insurance policy - Insurance agents had asked motorists to avoid driving past 8pm adding that their insurance claims would not be validated ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke onTwitter! The Association of Kenya Insurers (AKI) has said cars involved in accidents during curfew hours can be compensated.

item.title: China's Richest Man Loses $15 Billion In 24 Minutes
item.description: Li Hejun, China's richest man and chairman of solar panel firm Hanergy lost $15 billion in 24 minutes when the share price of the firm dropped 'abnormally' by 47% on Hong Kong share's market. He is said to own about 80% of the company whose total loss as result of drastic drop in share price stood at $18.6 billion. The decline resulted in authorities suspending trading in the firm's shares on Wednesday May 20. According to Reuters news agency, the company had been under investigation by authorities for manipulating their share price particularly because the drastic share drop come after a long running share appreciation that started in 2014.

item.title: Who Is Former Texas A&M Coach Jimbo Fisher's Wife?

The Gist: Coach Jimbo Fisher was fired from Texas A&M after five seasons with the team. He has been married twice over the course of his life, the first time for 22 years to Candi Fisher, and the second time in 2020 to Courtney Harrison Fisher.

item.title: Centenary Dnner Unites Jonathan, Obasanjo, Buhari
item.description: For the first time in recent times, all living former heads of government of Nigeria on Friday gathered under the same roof to join President Goodluck Jonathan in celebrating the 100 years of the nation’s amalgamation. The venue was the Presidential Villa, Abuja where the centenary anniversary presentation and award night/dinner was held. 100 persons, both living and dead, believed to have contributed meaningfully to national development, were honoured at the colourful event.

Harris has achieved great milestones in her career. She is a 6-time Emmy Award-winning journalist and the first black woman at FOX to host a weekday show known as Outnumbered. She also hosts her prime-time political franchise called Town Hall America with Harris Faulkner.

item.title: Roberto Firmino Links-Up With Mendy In Saudi's Al-Ahli
item.description: Former Liverpool forward, Roberto Firmino has signed a three-year deal with Al-Ahli of the Saudi Pro League. The 31-year-old Brazilian forward was a free agent after his Liverpool contract expired after the previous campaign. Firmino joined Liverpool in 2015 after leaving Hoffenheim and scored 111 goals in 362 games for the Premier League giants. He, Mohamed Salah, and Sadio Mane formed a lethal attacking combination that led Liverpool to Champions League, Premier League, FA Cup, and League Cup victories between 2019 and 2022.

item.title: Angry NASA supporters burn American flags outside US Embassy in Gigiri
item.description: - The small group of NASA supporters condemned US ambassador to Kenya Robert Godec for allegedly favouring the Jubilee government - They also burned American flags just about 100 metres from the US embassy in Gigiri - The group also carried placards some claiming Godec had been bribed byJubilee - A section of NASA youth had earlier demanded an apology from Godec Supporters of the opposition National Super Alliance gathered outside the United States of America Embassy in Gigiri, Nairobi county, on Friday, February 16, to protest against Ambassador Robert Godec.

item.title: Court Debunks Report Of Judge Resigning Over Differences On Petition Seeking Tinubu's Removal
item.description: The Court of Appeal on Thursday squashed circulating reports that a member of the five-person panel handling petitions seeking to nullify the election of President Bola Tinubu had resigned. A high-ranking official at the court, who requested anonymity due to lack of authorization to speak to the media, spoke with Vanguard, categorizing the news as “fake”. The source adamantly affirmed, “no such thing happened,” attributing the misinformation to the work of “evil rumour mongers.

item.title: Gov. Emmanuel Speaks On Blocking Atiku From Seeing PDP Delegates In Akwa Ibom
item.description: The Akwa Ibom State Governor, Udom Emmanuel has debunked reports claiming he has stopped former Vice President and 2023 presidential aspirant, Atiku Abubakar from visiting the state to consult with delegates of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Reports in some sections of the media had claimed Governor Emmanuel barred Atiku from his planned visit to the state on Monday. However, a statement on Sunday by the Akwa Ibom State Commissioner for Information and Strategy, Mr Ini Ememobong said there is nothing of such as the Governor has no power to stop aspirants from meeting with delegates.

item.title: Nigeria Jumps To 31st Position In February FIFA Rankings
item.description: Nigerian Super Eagles have moved up four places in this month’s Federation Internationale de Football Association (FIFA) rankings that have been released. Naija News learnt that the three-time African champions occupy the 31st spot in the world and third in Africa. Senegal’s Teranga Lions retained their spot as the best football nation in the continent and 20th in the world, and are closely trailed by Tunisia’s Carthage Eagles, who moved up two spots to the 27th position.

item.title: Reno Omokri Apologizes To Peter Obi Over Comments
item.description: Former presidential media aide, Reno Omokri has apologized to presidential aspirant, Peter Obi for his comments on a television program. Reno’s apology is coming after Peter Obi cautioned his supporters to refrain from attacking the personality of other aspirants and candidates under the guise of support his presidential bid. During his interview on Arise TV, Omokri had described Obi as opportunistic for dumping PDP for Labour Party, adding that LP conflicts his (Obi’s) ideology.

item.title: Does Billy Porter Have Kids? What to Know About the Broadway Icon
item.description: Billy Porter Would Be a Truly Amazing Parent, and Here's WhyBy Lizzy RosenbergMar. 5 2020, Updated 12:05 p.m. ET Source: GettyBilly Porter is loved by kids and adults alike, from his iconic hat at the Grammy's, to his role on Pose. Let's face it: he's a truly an incredible human being, and with his next role in a children's movie, Cinderella, many of the actor's beloved fans can't help but wonder if Billy Porter has kids himself.

item.title: Off-White Designer Virgil Abloh Survived by Wife, Two Kids
item.description: Off-White designer Virgil Abloh's death at age 41 was a devastating blow to the fashion community and his family, wife Shannon and two kids. Source: Getty ImagesThe world has lost a force in the fashion community. Off-White founder and designer Virgil Abloh passed away on Nov. 28, 2021, at the age of 41. "We are devastated to announce the passing of our beloved Virgil Abloh, a fiercely devoted father, husband, son, brother, and friend,"

item.title: Skai Jackson - Age, Family, Bio
'We Don't Want To Return To Era Of Dying In Queues'
item.description: The Nigeria Union of Pensioners (NUP) has threatened to sue the Federal government over its move to eliminate the Pension Transitional Arrangements Directorate (PTAD) without seeking legislative endorsement. Naija News reports that Southwest pensioners articulated their sentiments after convening on Thursday in a communique released to journalists in Abeokuta on Friday. According to the Oronsaye report, there were 541 parastatals, commissions, and agencies, with suggestions to decrease 263 to 161, abolish 38, and merge 52 for efficiency.

item.title: A Rundown of Everything Leaving 'Destiny 2' When 'The Witch Queen' Drops
item.description: A Rundown of Everything Leaving 'Destiny 2' When 'The Witch Queen' DropsBy Sara BelcherPublished Feb. 11 2022, 8:16 p.m. ET Source: BungieFans of Destiny 2 have been waiting for the newest DLC, The Witch Queen, to drop. This upcoming DLC will feature an entirely new campaign and world, bringing a more difficult play mode for those who prefer to grind their way through games, as well as the ability to craft for the first time ever in-game.

item.title: Melissa Rivers - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Daughter of the legendary comedienne Joan Rivers. She also starred on Celebrity Apprentice. Before Fame While studying at University of Pennsylvania, she helped found the Tabard Society. Trivia She made appearances on the TV shows 90210 and The Comeback. Family Life Her father was Edgar Rosenberg, a film and television producer. She married John Endicot in 1998, and the couple welcomed a son named Cooper in 2000. The couple divorced in 2003.

item.title: Why Does Apple Music Say Request Timed Out?
item.description: Apple Music is delivering some users a message saying 'request timed out,' which has led many to wonder what that message means and how to fix it. As one of the biggest competitors to Spotify in the music streaming space, Apple Music is supposed to seamlessly play subscribers whatever music they might be looking for. Unfortunately for some subscribers, though, Apple Music has been less cooperative than usual under some circumstances.

item.title: 8 of the Best Passover TV Episodes, Ranked
item.description: Every year, Jewish families come together to celebrate Passover. Which television shows have the best Passover episodes, seders and all? When it comes to Jewish holidays, they can often be a mystery to many in the non-Jewish world. However, thanks to television, holidays like Rosh Hashana, Passover, and Hanukkah have become mainstream (or close to it). For those who have never been to a Passover seder, a television episode can be their only way to experience of one of Judaism’s most important holidays.

item.title: Ann Waiguru asema angelikuwa ashamtema Ruto iwapo angelikuwa Uhuru
item.description: Gavana wa Kirinyaga Ann Waiguru amesema iwapo angelikuwa ni yeye yuko katika ndoa ya kisiasa na Naibu Rais William Ruto, angelikuwa ashampea talaka Akilinganisha muungano wa Rais Uhuru Kenyatta na naibu wake, Waiguru alimtaja Ruto kuwa mpenzi mwenye matusi ambaye hawezi akasimamisha ndoa imara. Habari Nyingine: Si lazima niwanie urais, DP Ruto sasa asema Akizungumza akiwa kaunti ya Kirinyaga, Waiguru alisema tofauti kati ya Uhuru na Ruto huenda hazitatuliwa kamwe na ni wakati sasa Rais anapaswa kufanya uamuzi.

item.title: How Does Otto Hightower Die in 'House of the Dragon'?
item.description: Otto Hightower certainly isn't the most caring dad around, but he certainly is the most calculating. How does he die in 'House of the Dragon'? Source: HBOSpoiler alert: The following article contains spoilers for House of the Dragon Episode 7 and George R.R. Martin's novel Fire & Blood. There are more calculations done on House of the Dragon than in a high school algebra class — however, the coldest, most calculating man of all has to be Otto Hightower (Rhys Ifans).

Robert Topala - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Game developer known for his company RobTopGames. He's most famous for creating Geometry Dash and Geometry Dash Meltdown. Before Fame His first gaming success was Boomlings, which won Best Mobile Game at the Swedish Game Awards in 2012. Trivia He has a YouTube channel with more than 9 million subscribers where he uploads trailers and updates to his games. Family Life He was born Robert Nicholas Christian Topala in Sweden. Associated With He and Jens Bergensten are both game designers from Sweden.

item.title: 2023: Ebonyi Governor Dave Umahi May Run For President
item.description: Femi Adesina, Special Adviser to President Muhammadu Buhari on Media, said Ebonyi Governor Dave Umahi could run for president in 2023. The president’s spokesman made the announcement in an article published on Friday titled ‘Dave Umahi’s Heart of Lion‘. He wrote that the All Progressives Congres (APC) has not yet fielded a nomination system so Umahi has the right to run for any government seat if he has enough supporters to lead him to victory.

item.title: Alan Alda - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for his role as Hawkeye Pierce in the popular television series M*A*S*H and his portrayal of Arnold Vinick in The West Wing. His film credits include The Aviator, What Women Want, Tower Heist and The Longest Ride. Before Fame He worked on the WFUV radio station at Fordham University. Trivia He has been a professor at SUNY Stony Brook. Family Life He married Arlene Alda in 1957. Together they had three children. Associated With He starred in Same Time, Next Year with Ellen Burstyn.

item.title: Glenda Reyna - Edad, Familia, Biografa
item.description: Acerca De Modelo y personalidad de televisión famosa por haber sido jurado de Mexico's Next Top Model. Durante su carrera en el modelaje desfiló en pasarelas de espectáculos de moda a lo largo de México, Europa y Estados Unidos. Antes de la Fama Creció en Caborca, México. Había estudiando inicialmente para ser dentista. Curiosidades Ha ofrecido gestión y capacitación en modelaje como fundadora de Glenda Reyna Management. Vida Familiar Sus hijos son Eiza y Yulen.

item.title: Mahogany LOX - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Singer, actress, DJ, and social media star on Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter and YouTube. She initially gained fame on Vine and was a part of the Magcon tour in 2014. She earned over 1 million followers on Vine. She has more than 1.3 million followers on Instagram and her YouTube channel has earned over 45 million views.  Before Fame She was named after the movie Mahogany, a film directed and produced by her grandfather Berry Gordy.

item.title: Man Arrested For Kidnapping His Mother-In-law (Video)
item.description: A notorious kidnapper has revealed that he is responsible for his mother-in-law’s hostage. The 49-year-old man, identified as Bunmi Ogunremi also known as Bunmi Bafon was taken into custody by operatives of the Ado–Ekiti Police Command. Ogunremi was apprehended alongside a food supplier and vulcanizer who is also their informant. The suspect also revealed that he and his team were responsible for the kidnap of  Alhaji Sulaimon Akinbami at Ureje in Ado Ekiti while also admitting to being responsible for various crimes in Ekiti and Ondo states.

item.title: 2023: I'll Compare Tinubu To Awolowo, Azikiwe, Ahmadu Bello
item.description: Former Governor of Nasarawa State, Tanko Umaru Al-Makura, has compared the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Bola Ahmed Tinubu, to the leaders of the First Republic. Speaking with reporters on Monday, Al-Mukra said Tinubu is in the same cateogry as Nnamdi Azikiwe, Obafemi Awolowo, Ladoke Akintola, and Sir Ahmadu Bello. He said Tinubu has also played a prominent role in helping Nigeria secure its independence, adding that he sacrificed his time and comfort for the sake of democracy.

item.title: Future - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Also known as Nayvadius Cash, an Atlanta-based autotune rapper who released the chart-topping album Pluto in 2012. Before Fame He began his career as a songwriter for Southern rappers like Ludacris. Trivia He had his first top five U.S. R&B single with "Turn On The Lights" in 2012. Family Life He has a brother named Rocko who is also a rapper. He had a son with Jessica Smith, who filed for child support in 2012.

item.title: How Bad Would a San Andreas Earthquake Be if It Happened Today?
item.description: How Bad Would a San Andreas Earthquake Be if It Happened?By Devan McGuinnessUpdated July 13 2020, 9:35 p.m. ET Source: Getty / David Paul MorrisThere is probably no one questioning that 2020 has been one of the most challenging years we've experienced. It seems like it's one thing after another that hits us when we're already down between the pandemic and murder bees, and now it looks like the weather isn't going to be kind either.

item.title: Julius Boros - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: World Golf Hall of Fame member who achieved many of his 18 PGA Tour victories well into his 40s. Before Fame He played baseball in college and played on the amateur side of golf for close to a decade before turning pro. Trivia He had a perfect record in the Ryder Cup Foursomes-- five wins, two ties, no losses. Family Life His son, Guy Boros, also won a PGA tour, in 1998.

item.title: Popular 'Ekwueme' Singer Osinachi Nwachukwu Is Dead
item.description: Popular Igbo Gospel Artiste, Evangelist Osinachi Nwachukwu is dead, Naija News reports. The Gospel singer who shot to limelight after the release of “Ekwueme” reportedly passed on this evening in an Abuja hospital. According to report, the married mother of four died of throat cancer. Osinachi Nwachukwu, a composer, servant of God and producer of Christian worship music, was also popular for hit song ‘Nara Ekele’ in which she was featured by Dunamis founder, Pastor Paul Enenche.

item.title: "NBET Pays Staff N289 Million Vacation Allowance A Day After Tinubu Ordered 60% Travel Expense Cut"
item.description: The Nigerian Bulk Electricity Trading (NBET) Plc has hurriedly paid its senior management staff N289 million as travel allowance for 2024. According to TheCable, although there is no suggestion of wrongdoing, the timing of the payments is raising eyebrows. Payments were made on January 10 — a day after President Bola Tinubu slashed the expenditure and number of people in the entourage for international and local travels by 60 percent.

item.title: 2023: My Presidential Ambition Is Not Threatened In APC
item.description: The Governor of Ebonyi State, David Umahi, on Monday stated that his defection from the Peoples Democratic Party to the All Progressives Congress does not pose a threat to his presidential ambition. He further stated that he feel happy rather than being threatened for joining the ruling party. According to Umahi, the more Governors the party has, the more chance the APC has to win the forthcoming general election. Umahi stated this while speaking during an interview on Channels TV on Monday.

item.title: How to flash an Android phone with and without a computer
item.description: The beauty of the Android operating system is its near limitless possibilities in terms of customization. One can have two similar devices from the same manufacturer running on completely different versions of the hugely popular OS. One of the most popular ways of changing your phone's look, feel, and functionality is through reprogramming, often known as flashing. We will look at how to flash an Android phone with and without a computer.

item.title: Buhari Fulfils 28-Year-Old Promise Abacha Made To Super Eagles In 1994
item.description: The Buhari-led federal government has approved the allocation of houses for 22 Super Eagles team members which was promised to them by General Sani Abacha in 1994. Twenty-eight years after the promise was made by Abacha, Buhari has decided to fulfill it. The president, represented by the Minister of State for Science, Technology, and Innovation, Mr. Muhammed Abdullahi, stated this at Lafia, Nasarawa State, during the commissioning of the completed homes under the administration’s National Housing Programme initiative.

item.title: New Kids on the Block then and now: profiles, net worth, where are they today?
item.description: When the New Edition band formed in 1978 and enjoyed success in the 80s, it inspired the rise of many other boy bands. One of those was New Kids on the Block (NKOTB). Some of their songs ranked high on the charts for many years, a factor that allowed them to sell over 70 million records. In 1994, the group disbanded but announced a comeback in 2007. How are the New Kids on the Block then and now?

item.title: There's a Coin Shortage, and Thank Goodness Because Carrying Change Is Annoying
item.description: Here's something that probably only a few Americans care about: a coin shortage. Find out why we’re suddenly unable to come up with change. You see meters littering the sidewalk, annoying, but because it's 2020, there will definitely be the option to pay with a card, right? Or maybe they'll even have one of those annoying "Park Mobile" type apps that force you to load up a minimum prepaid amount.

item.title: What Is the Wave House on TikTok? Its a New Group of Content Creators

There are multiple groups of these young creators on the platform, including U.K.’s own Wave House. But because it’s so new, people have lots of questions about it.

item.title: Who Is Dr. Andrews Wife on The Good Doctor?
item.description: Dr. Andrews’ ex-wife comes back to ‘The Good Doctor’ in Season 6, portrayed by Golden Brooks. However, something is a little bit different. Spoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for The Good Doctor Season 6, Episode 7. Every Monday, we love tuning in to our favorite hospital procedural, The Good Doctor, for a completely different social experience of what it’s like to work in a hospital. Of course, the romance plotlines are as wild as ever — we can’t have a hospital series without some love — but in Season 6, Episode 7, titled “Boys Don’t Cry,” one ex-lover comes back in a new way.

item.title: 'From Drug Lord To Presidential Candidate'
item.description: The Presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress in the 2023 race, Bola Tinubu has been attracting numerous controversies about his past. Over the years questions have been raised on the issue of his age, certificate, identity and how he made his wealth. There are beliefs that the man Tinubu started when he moved to Lagos State to live with his surrogate mother, Alhaja Abibatu Mogaji. Some of these questions have been left unanswered as he plans to take over from President Muhammadu Buhari at the end of his tenure in 2023.

item.title: Chiwetalu Speaks After Arrest, Reveals The Meaning Of His Outfit To Soldiers
item.description: Veteran Nollywood actor, Chinwetalu Agu has spoken after his arrest by the Nigerian army. In the video, Agu is seen telling the armed soldiers while sitting on the ground that his attire does not represent Biafra or Eastern Security Network and pointed to the sun symbol emboldened on the cloth saying it was simply a representation of the rising sun. He also added that he was sharing bread at Upper Iweka when he was taken away and he was not campaigning for Biafra.

item.title: Ephraim Inoni - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: President of Cameroon from 2004 to 2009. He was arrested in 2012 in connection with the Albatross affair wherein several state and corporate officials are alleged to have swindled over FCFA 15 billion intended for the purchase of a presidential aircraft in 2003. Before Fame He was Treasurer of the Cameroonian Embassy to the United States. Trivia He served as both the Secretary of State for Finances and the Deputy Secretary General.

item.title: Is Bill Skarsgrd's Keith a Bad Guy in Zach Cregger's Horror Masterpiece 'Barbarian'? (SPOILERS)
item.description: There's no way to predict which way 2022's horror film 'Barbarian' will go. Specifically, our guards are up concerning Keith. Is he a bad guy? Source: Regency EnterprisesSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Barbarian. Not only is Zach Cregger's Barbarian an unpredictable ride into hell, but its cast is stellar. Starring Georgina Campbell (All My Friends Hate Me), Justin Long (Tusk), and Bill Skarsgård (It) — aka three seasoned horror actors — Barbarian centers on Tess Marshall (Georgina Campbell), a woman who books a rental home in a rundown, seemingly unsafe Detroit neighborhood for the eve of a job interview.

item.title: 7 tips for dating without a car to avoid turning off women
item.description: Is dating without a car a bummer? Owning a car will certainly help you attract women, but not owning one should not necessarily turn them off. With several options available to meet your daily transportation needs, it is not a guarantee to attract women into your life but with proper tactics. Successfully dating without a car is, therefore, a chance that men should only take with the help of our mind-blowing tips.

item.title: Ganduje Drops 2023 Senatorial Ambition For Jibrin
item.description: The Kano State Governor, Abdullahi Ganduje is understood to have dropped his 2023 senatorial ambition for peace to reign in the All Progressives Congress (APC) state chapter. Naija News gathered the Governor will now be supporting Barau Jibrin to continue representing Kano North Senatorial district in the National Assembly. The development is said to be a result of the meeting between the duo in Abuja over the weekend which was brokered by some party stakeholders.

item.title: Why Isn't There a Reunion for The Valley Season 1?
item.description: Jax and Brittany Confirm That They Didn’t Film a Reunion for 'The Valley' Season 1"I don't want to give too much away," Jax Taylor said on his podcast, about the future of 'The Valley.' By Chrissy BobicMay 13 2024, Updated 9:55 a.m. ET Source: Casey Durkin/BravoApparently, not all Bravo shows are created equally. Because even though The Valley, which is kind of/sort of a Vanderpump Rules spinoff, was green-lit for a second season before Season 1 was even over, there is no reunion to give the messy cast a chance to meet up and re-hash their issues on-screen for viewers to see.

item.title: Buhari Orders Demolition Of Military Checkpoints
item.description: Following the meeting with security chiefs, President Muhammadu Buhari has ordered the immediate demolition of all military checkpoints across the country. The News Agency of Nigeria cited Aliyu Ismail, the permanent secretary, ministry of defence, as unveiling this information. READ ALSO: President Buhari Meets Service Chiefs  According to the permanent secretary, the meeting with the security chiefs was to give them the opportunity to brief the president on the implementations of recent decisions reached on the fight against insurgency.

item.title: NAIJ.com launches Nigerian blogger network

We are opening our website and app for writers, bloggers, photographers and all sorts of "noise makers". If you are a seasoned writer or a complete newbie - apply and become Nigeria’s next star blogger. The first Legit.ng partner bloggers have already benefited and become a part of our platform.

Trivia His and Slim's single "No Flex Zone!" peaked at #36 on the US Billboard Hot 100 chart and landed in the top 20 on the US R&B and US Rap charts. item.title: Why Is 'The Goldbergs' Ending? Here's What We Know!
item.description: The ABC series 'The Goldbergs' is set to end after Season 10. Here's everything we know about why the show is coming to an end. Source: Getty ImagesAfter 10 years as a part of ABC’s primetime lineup, The Goldbergs is ending its run. The series, which first premiered in 2013, follows the wacky adventures of a family living in a suburban Philadelphia neighborhood. Jeff Garlin, Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, and George Segal made up the show’s original cast and have since become beloved by fans.

Brooke and her husband, Chris Henchy, have two daughters, Grier Hammond, age 16, and Rowan Francis, age 19. Both girls support their mom's project and appeared in the film.

Behind the beautiful image of a YouTube workaholic was a teen struggling with an eating disorder.

item.title: Tinubu Unfit To Accuse Us Of Falsifying Documents
item.description: The Labour Party (LP) has distanced itself from claims by the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) that it was responsible for the alleged forgery of the letterhead of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC). The Labour Party asked the ruling party to look within its rank for those responsible for the forgery. Naija News recalls that a document with the letterhead of the INEC surfaced on on social media platforms on Friday, which claimed that the electoral agency is investigating a drug case in the United States involving Tinubu.

Family Life His wife's name is Shizuka. Associated With Frederic Chopin was one of MacAlpine's earliest musical influence.

item.title: Francophone countries in West Africa and their capitals
item.description: There are 31 french speaking countries in Africa. Now, the French language in Africa is more than the legacy of the colonialists. The role of this language is very important throughout the continent. French is still a popular and important language in many African countries. Prior to English, French was the standard language for literature, art, and diplomacy. French administration conducted French-language education in its colonies. Because of various languages, French has become a lingua franca or common language in some parts of Africa.

Ministry of Health Kenya Organizational Structure
item.description: Matters of health come into play when the lives of many are on the line. They should be handled with care and so has the Ministry of health Kenya put up all measures to ensure the docket is functional and effective in its operations. The Government of Kenya has a yearly budgetary allocation of Kenya shillings 60 billion in support of infrastructural development, logistics, staff compensation, administration among other functions under the Ministry of health Kenya.

item.title: Simon Kassianides - Age, Family, Bio

item.title: Unfaithful' Real? Here's What We Know

item.title: ASUU: Only In Nigeria Will Universities Be On Strike And We Are Campaigning For 2023 Election
item.description: Former Anambra State Governor and 2023 presidential aspirant, Peter Obi has lamented the current situation where public universities are on strike but 2023 campaigns have taken over almost every space of national life. Obi who lamented that such can only happen in Nigeria, described the situation as not only sad but unacceptable. Naija News reports the presidential hopeful made his mind known on Wednesday during a guest appearance on the Berekete family radio in Abuja.

item.title: FG Withdraws Suit Against NLC, TUC
item.description: The federal government has made a U-turn and withdrawn the suit filed against the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) and the Trade Union Congress (TUC) over the protest embarked upon on August 2. The government’s letter addressed to the labour unions on the new development through their counsel, Femi Falana said the suit was withdrawn because it had been overtaken by events. The letter signed by the Permanent Secretary of the Federal Ministry of Justice, Beatrice Jeddy-Agba said the ministry filed the contempt proceedings before the interventions of President Bola Tinubu, and the National Assembly in the dispute.

Trivia He became the first person to ever win a Stanley Cup as a player and owner, both with the Pittsburgh Penguins.

item.title: Nigerian Army Speaks On Releasing Boko Haram Fighters In Borno
item.description: The Nigerian Army has debunked the reports of the release of Boko Haram fighters in Borno State. The Director Army Public Relations, Onyema Nwachukwu, in a statement on Thursday, said the reports were false and a malicious attempt to dampen troops’ morale and denigrate the Nigerian Army. Nwachukwu noted that the military does not plan to join issues with the masterminds of the report but will make efforts to set the records straight.

item.title: Azman, Air Peace Suspend Flights To Kaduna Airport Over Airport Attack
item.description: Two Nigerian flight carriers, Azman and Air Peace have suspended flights to Kaduna International Airport over the recent attack on the facility. Naija News had reported that bandit terrorists on Saturday took over the runway of the airport and killed a security guard who was on duty. However, the gunmen were repelled by security operatives during a heavy shootout, which led to a delay of a Lagos-bound Azman flight. In a statement issued on Monday, Azman Air said the suspension of flights at the Kaduna international airport is to ensure that the safety of travellers and workers is guaranteed.

item.title: Chief of Army Staff Storm Maiduguri After Fresh Boko Haram Attack In Borno
item.description: The Chief of Army Staff (COAS), Maj Gen Ibrahim Attahiru on Saturday arrived in Maiduguri, Borno State after Boko Haram attack on two communities. item.title: Man Arraigned For Allegedly Being In Possession Of
item.description: A  49-year-old man, Ezekiel Ibe, has been arraigned before the Federal High Court in Lagos by the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) for allegedly being in possession tramadol. Mr. Jerry Aernan, who is an NDLEA prosecutor, revealed that the defendant was arrested on December 23, 2021, at Amuwo-Odofin, Lagos, for unlawful possession of 5,458. 894 kilograms of , without lawful authority The prosecutor, Justice Yellim while speaking to the trial Judge said the offense is contrary to and punishable under Section 11(c) of the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency Act Cap N20 Laws of the Federation of Nigerian, 2004.

item.title: We Will Back You For 2023 Presidency
item.description: The National Leader of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu, has been endorsed for the 2023 Presidency by the Kano state chapter of the party. Naija News reports that the Speaker of the Kano State House of Assembly, Hamisu Chidari, gave the endorsement while speaking at the inauguration of the Tinubu Support Group and its state steering committees in Abuja on Saturday. The Kano speaker stated that Tinubu has been instrumental to the growth of APC in the country and should be rewarded for his dedication and loyalty to the party.

After the family man and respected physical therapist mysteriously disappears, his wife, Sophie Brewer (Betty Gabriel) his sister, Pia Brewer (Zoe Kazan), and, eventually, his son, Kai Brewer (Jaylin Fletcher) begin to investigate what happened along with a detective, Roshan Amiri (Phoenix Raei).

item.title: UK List Seven Nigerian States That Must Be Avoided [Full List]
item.description: The United Kingdom government has warned citizens against visiting seven Northern states with a ‘high level security threat.’ The Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) disclosed this on the UK government website, citing the recent terrorists attack on a Kaduna-bound train. According to the FCDO, the northern states include; Borno, Yobe, Adamawa, Gombe, Kaduna, Katsina and Zamfara states. The UK govt stated that these states are prone to violence and high threat of kidnapping.

item.title: Gas Infrastructure Deficit Requires $2bn Annually
item.description: The Minister of State for Petroleum Resources, Timipre Sylva on Tuesday said the Federal Government has put the estimated amount required to bridge Nigeria’s gas infrastructure deficit at $2bn annually. Sylva revealed this at the inauguration of the Governing Council of the Midstream and Downstream Gas Infrastructure Fund. According to the minister, the cause of poor gas production, gas flaring and low domestic gas utilisation across Nigeria is the gas infrastructure deficit.

item.title: Lagos Civil Servants To Work From Office Three Days A Week
item.description: The Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, has announced that the state government is finalizing plans to introduce a flexible workweek for its employees. Speaking during a media chat with journalists on Thursday in Lagos, the governor outlined the new arrangement that would see civil servants from level 1 to 14 working from their offices for only three days a week. Furthermore, the governor specified that employees on levels 15 to 17 are expected to report to their offices four times a week, indicating a tailored approach to different grade levels within the civil service.

item.title: Troops Repel Boko Haram In Konduga, Kill Scores
item.description: Nigerian troops have once again killed scores of Boko Haram insurgents at Konduga, Borno state. According to a statement on the official website of the Defence Headquarters, this morning, September 17, the troops crushed the insurgents who were on a revenge mission to Konduga. Soldiers had last week killed no fewer than 150 insurgents in Konduga and the sect had regrouped and came back yesterday in greater force but they were repelled by the soldiers in a gun battle which lasted for about 12 hours, beginning last night, till the early hours of today.

item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Thursday, 15th June, 2023
item.description: Good morning Nigeria, welcome to Naija News roundup of top newspaper headlines in Nigeria for today, Thursday, 15th June 2023 President Bola Ahmed Tinubu on Wednesday approved the indefinite suspension of the Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC), AbdulRasheed Bawa. Naija News reports that the suspension comes following an investigation into his conduct while in office. The President directed Bawa to immediately hand over the affairs of his office to the Director, Operations in the Commission, who will oversee the affairs of the Office of the Chairman of the Commission pending the conclusion of the investigation.

item.title: You Must Deliver To Me 95% Votes, Forget Atiku, Peter Obi
item.description: The presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, on Sunday demanded 95 per cent votes from Ekiti State residents as he woo the residents ahead of the February 2023 elections. Naija News reports that the former Governor of Lagos State was in the state today as a guest of honour at the swearing-in ceremony of the State Governor, Abiodun Oyebanji. Delivering a speech at the occasion, Tinubu urged the residents to forget about his counterparts from the opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, and Labour Party candidate, Peter Obi and delivered their votes to him in the forthcoming election.
